tour.budget_desc: This section is for you to check the status of your budget, don't forget to look at it!
tour.stats_desc: Don't forget to analyze your statistics! The app shows many and they say a lot about you!
tour.add_desc: Add a session to register the time you spent scrolling.
tour.settings_desc: Set your preferences and customize the app according to your tastes and cases
tour.defaults_desc: This section allows you to define defaults for sessions, so you don't have to type the same information every time.
tour.missions_desc: Complete offline missions to pay back your scroll debt.
tour.awards_desc: Track your achievements and see the badges you've unlocked.

settings.bankruptcy_desc: Fight against your scroll debt in an even more effective and difficult way!
settings.title: Settings
settings.reset_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This cannot be undone.
settings.manage_hobbies_hint: Tap to select, hold to edit custom ones
settings.tap_to_edit_hint: Tap on a custom item to edit or delete it.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.no_data: Still no data to display. Start logging your scroll sessions to see your habits here!

awards.title: Awards
awards.unlocked_message: You have unlocked a new badge.

marathon.title: Marathoner
marathon.desc: Log a session longer than 60 minutes.

streak_3.title: Consistent
streak_3.desc: Log sessions 3 days in a row.

zen.title: Scroll Free
zen.desc: Record 0 minutes of scroll debt in a day.

social_detox_1.title: Digital Detox
social_detox_1.desc: Go 24 hours without using any social apps.

social_detox_2.title: Clean Break
social_detox_2.desc: Go 48 hours without using any social apps.

social_detox_3.title: Deep Cleanse
social_detox_3.desc: Go 3 days without using any social apps.

mission_daily_2.title: Double Strike
mission_daily_2.desc: Complete 2 missions in a single day.

mission_daily_3.title: Mission Spree
mission_daily_3.desc: Complete 3 missions in a single day.

welcome.title: Scroll Debt
welcome.subtitle: Turn your doomscrolling into an adventure against yourself!
welcome.feature_3: You pay it back with offline fun

budget.title: Set your limit
budget.subtitle: How much scrolling is okay per day?

guide.step_1_desc: Every minute you doomscroll adds to your Scroll Debt. The algorithm is charging you interest, and you're paying with your life.
guide.step_2_title: Pay It Back. In Real Life.
guide.step_2_desc: Don't just feel guilty—do something. Complete Offline Missions to clear your debt. Squat, draw, breathe, or just touch grass.
guide.step_3_desc: Earn badges, unlock streaks, and prove you're not a bot. Turn your digital detox into your biggest high score.

home.calendar_view_description: View your scroll history in a calendar view.
home.bankruptcy_explanation: Debt accumulates when you exceed your daily budget. If it reaches 500m, you declare bankruptcy and lose your progress.

bankruptcy_modal.title: Bankruptcy Protocol
bankruptcy_modal.warning_desc: You have enabled high-stakes accountability. Your debt is not just a number—it has consequences.
bankruptcy_modal.mechanism_desc: Every minute you spend scrolling BEYOND your daily budget is added to your permanent debt record. Unused budget is lost; it does not offset previous debt.
bankruptcy_modal.limit_desc: Your debt cap is 500 minutes. This is a hard limit. The moment your accumulated debt + today's overage crosses this line, bankruptcy is declared immediately.
bankruptcy_modal.consequence_2: All Unlocked Awards & Badges are permanently lost.
bankruptcy_modal.consequence_3: Your Streak is reset to zero.

bankruptcy_declared.title: BANKRUPTCY DECLARED
bankruptcy_declared.desc: Your total debt (past + today) hit 500m. Protocols engaged: Awards Wiped. Streak Reset.

missions.title: Missions
missions.subtitle: Complete missions to reduce the debt
missions.no_missions_description: Go back to the Home page to accept a new mission!

creative.desc_1: Grab a pen or any app and doodle something for 5 minutes, no judgment.
creative.desc_2: Spend 10 minutes on a creative project you've left unfinished.
creative.desc_3: Turn one thought into something tangible: a line, a sketch, a melody.
creative.desc_4: Write down three crazy ideas you'd love to try one day.
creative.desc_5: Write a tiny three-line story about what you were about to scroll.
creative.desc_6: Take a picture of something in the real world that makes you smile (no selfie).
creative.desc_7: Fill one sticky note with a word or drawing that describes your day.
creative.desc_8: Create or update a playlist that feels like ‘you right now'.
creative.desc_9: Collect or draw 3 things you'd like to see in your life in the next months.
creative.desc_10: Record a quick voice note to yourself about what you want to change.
creative.desc_11: Grab 3 objects around you and arrange them like a tiny photo set.
creative.desc_12: Write a super short letter to tomorrow-you (max 5 lines).
creative.desc_13: Capture one idea you've been postponing and jot down the very first step.
creative.desc_14: Take something that already exists (quote, drawing, photo) and remix it your way.
creative.desc_15: Draw 10 random lines and try to turn them into something recognizable.

active.desc_1: Stand up and walk for 5 minutes, even if it's just around the room.
active.desc_2: Do 10 push-ups, 10 squats or 10 jumping jacks. Your choice.
active.desc_3: Go up and down the stairs for 3 minutes (or mimic the movement).
active.desc_4: Stretch your neck, shoulders and back for at least 3 minutes.
active.desc_5: Go outside and walk to the corner without checking your phone.
active.desc_6: Count 100 slow steps while focusing only on your breath.
active.desc_7: Stand up for 2 minutes with your spine tall and shoulders open.
active.desc_8: Play one song and dance without judging yourself until it ends.
active.desc_9: Pick a simple exercise and repeat it for 3 minutes with a timer.
active.desc_10: Open a window or step outside and take 10 deep breaths.
active.desc_11: Do 20 slow shoulder rolls, forwards and backwards.
active.desc_12: Walk a full loop around your room or house noticing small details.
active.desc_13: Fix one tiny thing: a chair, a shirt on the floor, a cup in the sink.
active.desc_14: Drink a glass of water slowly, without looking at any screen.
active.desc_15: Look outside for 2 minutes and spot at least 5 things you hadn't noticed before.

relaxing.desc_1: Close your eyes and take 10 deep breaths, inhaling for 4 and exhaling for 6.
relaxing.desc_2: Sit comfortably, put your phone away and stay in silence for 3 minutes.
relaxing.desc_3: Turn off the noise. No audio for 5 minutes, just ambient sound.
relaxing.desc_4: Prepare a warm drink and sip it slowly, focusing on taste and smell.
relaxing.desc_5: Name 5 things you see, 4 you hear, 3 you can touch, 2 you can smell, 1 you can taste.
relaxing.desc_6: Do a quick mental body scan from head to toe in 2 minutes.
relaxing.desc_7: Put your phone on Do Not Disturb for the next 15 minutes.
relaxing.desc_8: Focus on a far point (window or wall) for 60 seconds.
relaxing.desc_9: Read a single page of a book or printed article without skipping lines.
relaxing.desc_10: Reach your arms above your head, stretch and let out an exaggerated sigh.
relaxing.desc_11: Dim the lights or turn one off to create a calmer atmosphere.
relaxing.desc_12: Close your eyes for 60 seconds and just notice what thoughts appear.
relaxing.desc_13: Listen to one relaxing track without doing anything else.
relaxing.desc_14: Tidy one small area: a corner of your desk, a shelf, a nightstand.
relaxing.desc_15: Think of or write down three things you're grateful for today.

skill.desc_1: Spend 5 minutes reading or reviewing something you want to learn.
skill.desc_2: Focus for 10 minutes on a skill you've been neglecting (language, code, instrument).
skill.desc_3: Write which skill you want to improve this month and what the next tiny step is.
skill.desc_4: Read 5-10 pages of a book that helps you grow.
skill.desc_5: Complete a single exercise in a course, app or tutorial you're following.
skill.desc_6: Create or review at least 5 flashcards on a topic you care about.
skill.desc_7: Write a short note about something you've learned recently.
skill.desc_8: Watch or listen to a short lesson (max 10 minutes) and note one key takeaway.
skill.desc_9: Explain a concept out loud as if you were teaching it to someone else.
skill.desc_10: Set a 5-minute timer of pure focus on studying or practicing.
skill.desc_11: Add or refine one tiny piece of your portfolio, CV or profile.
skill.desc_12: Write one question that, if answered, would improve your work or life.
skill.desc_13: Revisit an old note or project and write down one thing to improve.
skill.desc_14: Learn 3 new words or phrases in a language you like.
skill.desc_15: Define in 3 bullets what you want to learn this week and when you'll do it.

entertainment.desc_1: Grab a board game, cards or puzzle and play for 10 minutes.
entertainment.desc_2: Do something that has always made you laugh, even as a kid, for at least 5 minutes.
entertainment.desc_3: Invent a tiny silly challenge just for fun—and actually do it.
entertainment.desc_4: Recreate a funny meme or movie scene, even if you're alone.
entertainment.desc_5: Play a hype song and sing or move without overthinking it.
entertainment.desc_6: Open a book at random and read the first paragraph out loud.
entertainment.desc_7: Pick one object and invent three absurd alternative uses for it.
entertainment.desc_8: Do a 30-second performance (voice, dance, magic) just for yourself.
entertainment.desc_9: Look at an old photo or listen to a song that reminds you of a good moment.
entertainment.desc_10: Try to remember and write down a joke or a funny story.
entertainment.desc_11: Fold a piece of paper and try to turn it into any shape (even a terrible one).
entertainment.desc_12: Think of or jot down a riddle you can ask someone later.
entertainment.desc_13: Do lip sync to a song with no sound or very low volume.
entertainment.desc_14: Invent a small skill game (toss a pen into a cup, etc.) and try to beat your own score.
entertainment.desc_15: Recall an awkward moment from your past and retell it in a funny way.

other.desc_1: Pick one thing you've been postponing for days and give it 5 minutes.
other.desc_2: Send a genuine message to someone you haven't talked to in a while.
other.desc_3: Change room, position or environment to reset your brain.
other.desc_4: Write a list of 3 things you absolutely need to do today.
other.desc_5: Choose one item to throw away, donate or put back in its place.
other.desc_6: Review a recent expense or your balance without opening any social app.
other.desc_7: Write the 3 main things you want to achieve tomorrow.
other.desc_8: Talk to someone in real life for at least 2 minutes.
other.desc_9: Clear or organize a tiny portion of your inbox or notes.
other.desc_10: Do one small act of care: wash your face, change your shirt, fix your hair.
other.desc_11: Clean one surface (desk, table, sink) for 3 minutes.
other.desc_12: Close all background apps one by one, with intention.
other.desc_13: Set a reminder for something important you don't want to forget.
other.desc_14: Write in 3 sentences what you did today and how you feel.
other.desc_15: For 2 minutes, do absolutely nothing… on purpose.

custom.desc_2: Dedicate time to improve your {{hobby}} skills.
custom.desc_3: Enjoy a session of {{hobby}} without distractions.
custom.desc_4: Immerse yourself in {{hobby}} for a while.
custom.desc_5: Make progress on your {{hobby}} projects today.

rescue.title: Rescue Mode
rescue.subtitle: Put down the phone and save your day.
rescue.timer_desc: Don't close the app. Just breathe, or do something else.
rescue.success_subtitle: You reclaimed {{minutes}} minutes of your life.
rescue.notification_body: You have successfully completed your rescue session.

safe.q1: Future you is deeply grateful right now.
safe.q2: Your screen time today is lower than your GPA. Keep it up.
safe.q3: Today you're actually living reality, not just watching it.
safe.q4: Look at you… as if social media never existed.
safe.q5: Your thumb is finally resting. You have no idea how happy it is.
safe.q6: Your brain just switched from scroll mode to real-life mode.
safe.q7: You spent more time living than watching others live. Nice.
safe.q8: Today the algorithm looked for you… and couldn't find you.
safe.q9: You just proved your time is not on clearance sale.
safe.q10: Congrats, you're treating your attention like something valuable.
safe.q11: Your notifications are having abandonment issues. You aren't.
safe.q12: Today you gave more likes to life than to the screen.
safe.q13: Your eyes just earned a tiny bonus in peace and quiet.
safe.q14: If everyone had your screen time today, social apps would panic.
safe.q15: You just proved you can close an app. That's rarer than you think.
safe.q16: Keep going: future you will buy you a drink, not send you a bill.

warning.q1: Your thumb got more cardio than you today.
warning.q2: Careful, you're entering the danger zone.
warning.q3: Is this reel really worth your future?
warning.q4: Tick tock. The algorithm is winning.
warning.q5: You're one cat video away from regret.
warning.q6: One more scroll and it's officially a habit, not a break.
warning.q7: You're stretching your thumb, not your life.
warning.q8: You opened the app 'for a second'. It's already half an episode.
warning.q9: If time is money, you're impulse-buying content.
warning.q10: You still have time to close the app and pretend nothing happened.
warning.q11: Future you is raising an eyebrow right now.
warning.q12: You can still choose before the algorithm chooses for you.
warning.q13: You're not late yet… but the train of your day is about to leave.
warning.q14: You're starting to mix up 'relaxing' with 'numbing out'.
warning.q15: That's the third time you said 'last video'. Suspicious.
warning.q16: If you feel a tiny bit guilty, that's your time knocking.

danger.q3: The sunlight is asking where you are.
danger.q4: Blinking does not count as a real break.
danger.q5: Your battery is draining, and so is your energy.
danger.q6: You've crossed from 'nice break' to 'lost the day'.
danger.q7: This isn't scrolling anymore, it's content archaeology.
danger.q8: Do you still know the time without checking the top-left corner?
danger.q9: You've watched more of other people's lives than your own today.
danger.q10: Your hand remembers the scroll gesture better than a handshake.
danger.q11: You're running a marathon… while standing still.
danger.q12: The algorithm is on a first-name basis with you now.
danger.q13: You're trading unique minutes for recyclable content.
danger.q14: You're officially past the 'I don't even notice anymore' point.
danger.q15: Future you is already drafting a list of 'things you could have done'.
danger.q16: You're at the stage where you keep scrolling just because you're already scrolling.

over.q1: You're officially in debt with your future self.
over.q2: Hope that dopamine hit was worth the price tag.
over.q3: Imagine what you could've built with this time.
over.q4: The Scroll Debt collector is at the door.
over.q5: Game Over. Insert time to continue.
over.q6: You've finished today's level. Tomorrow is payback day.
over.q7: You've invested half a day in content you won't remember tomorrow.
over.q8: Your time just texted: 'Seen, but not considered'.
over.q9: You basically signed a time mortgage with brutal interest.
over.q11: You just won the award for 'best unpaid audience for the algorithm'.
over.q12: Your scroll debt is now higher than your patience.
over.q13: If this were a game, you'd have burned through a lot of lives.
over.q14: You just traded real hours for seconds of entertainment.
over.q15: From here on, the only sane move is to close everything and stand up.
over.q16: You can't rewind this time, but you can choose what to do with the next minute.
